titles.title: Congratulating East High School of Denver, Colorado, on winning the 2007 "We the People: The Citizen and the Constitution" national competition.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
7/30/2007--Introduced.
Congratulates East High School of Denver, Colorado, on winning the 2007 "We the People: The Citizen and the Constitution" competition.
